khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
khalaqa al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīnun
wal-anʿāma khalaqahā lakum fīhā dif'on wamanāfiʿu wamin'hā takulūna
walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
wataḥmilu athqālakum ilā baladin lam takūnū bālighīhi illā bishiqqi al-anfusi inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
wal-khayla wal-bighāla wal-ḥamīra litarkabūhā wazīnatan wayakhluqu mā lā taʿlamūna
waʿalā al-lahi qaṣdu al-sabīli wamin'hā jāirun walaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
translations: surely He would have guided you

transliteration: huwa alladhī anzala mina al-samāi māan lakum min'hu sharābun wamin'hu shajarun fīhi tusīmūna
yunbitu lakum bihi al-zarʿa wal-zaytūna wal-nakhīla wal-aʿnāba wamin kulli al-thamarāti inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yatafakkarūna
wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra wal-shamsa wal-qamara wal-nujūmu musakharātun bi-amrihi inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yaʿqilūna
wamā dhara-a lakum fī al-arḍi mukh'talifan alwānuhu inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yadhakkarūna
wahuwa alladhī sakhara al-baḥra litakulū min'hu laḥman ṭariyyan watastakhrijū min'hu ḥil'yatan talbasūnahā watarā al-ful'ka mawākhira fīhi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi walaʿallakum tashkurūna

afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna

wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
wa-alladhīna yadʿūna min dūni al-lahi lā yakhluqūna shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fa-alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati qulūbuhum munkiratun wahum mus'takbirūna
lā jarama anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna innahu lā yuḥibbu al-mus'takbirīna
wa-idhā qīla lahum mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū asāṭīru al-awalīna
liyaḥmilū awzārahum kāmilatan yawma al-qiyāmati wamin awzāri alladhīna yuḍillūnahum bighayri ʿil'min alā sāa mā yazirūna
qad makara alladhīna min qablihim fa-atā al-lahu bun'yānahum mina al-qawāʿidi fakharra ʿalayhimu al-saqfu min fawqihim wa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
thumma yawma al-qiyāmati yukh'zīhim wayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tushāqqūna fīhim qāla alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma inna al-khiz'ya al-yawma wal-sūa ʿalā al-kāfirīna
alladhīna tatawaffāhumu al-malāikatu ẓālimī anfusihim fa-alqawū al-salama mā kunnā naʿmalu min sūin balā inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
fa-ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā falabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
waqīla lilladhīna ittaqaw mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū khayran lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihi al-dun'yā ḥasanatun waladāru al-ākhirati khayrun walaniʿ'ma dāru al-mutaqīna
jannātu ʿadnin yadkhulūnahā tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru lahum fīhā mā yashāūna kadhālika yajzī al-lahu al-mutaqīna
alladhīna tatawaffāhumu al-malāikatu ṭayyibīna yaqūlūna salāmun ʿalaykumu ud'khulū al-janata bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
hal yanẓurūna illā an tatiyahumu al-malāikatu aw yatiya amru rabbika kadhālika faʿala alladhīna min qablihim wamā ẓalamahumu al-lahu walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūna
fa-aṣābahum sayyiātu mā ʿamilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna

waqāla alladhīna ashrakū law shāa al-lahu mā ʿabadnā min dūnihi min shayin naḥnu walā ābāunā walā ḥarramnā min dūnihi min shayin kadhālika faʿala alladhīna min qablihim fahal ʿalā al-rusuli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu

walaqad baʿathnā fī kulli ummatin rasūlan ani uʿ'budū al-laha wa-ij'tanibū al-ṭāghūta famin'hum man hadā al-lahu wamin'hum man ḥaqqat ʿalayhi al-ḍalālatu fasīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
in taḥriṣ ʿalā hudāhum fa-inna al-laha lā yahdī man yuḍillu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
wa-aqsamū bil-lahi jahda aymānihim lā yabʿathu al-lahu man yamūtu balā waʿdan ʿalayhi ḥaqqan walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
liyubayyina lahumu alladhī yakhtalifūna fīhi waliyaʿlama alladhīna kafarū annahum kānū kādhibīna
innamā qawlunā lishayin idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
wa-alladhīna hājarū fī al-lahi min baʿdi mā ẓulimū lanubawwi-annahum fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wala-ajru al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
translations: surely We will give them position

transliteration: alladhīna ṣabarū waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
wamā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim fasalū ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum lā taʿlamūna
bil-bayināti wal-zuburi wa-anzalnā ilayka al-dhik'ra litubayyina lilnnāsi mā nuzzila ilayhim walaʿallahum yatafakkarūna
afa-amina alladhīna makarū al-sayiāti an yakhsifa al-lahu bihimu al-arḍa aw yatiyahumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
aw yakhudhahum ʿalā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
awalam yaraw ilā mā khalaqa al-lahu min shayin yatafayya-u ẓilāluhu ʿani al-yamīni wal-shamāili sujjadan lillahi wahum dākhirūna
walillahi yasjudu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi min dābbatin wal-malāikatu wahum lā yastakbirūna
yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
waqāla al-lahu lā tattakhidhū ilāhayni ith'nayni innamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun fa-iyyāya fa-ir'habūni

thumma idhā kashafa al-ḍura ʿankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikūna
liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
wayajʿalūna limā lā yaʿlamūna naṣīban mimmā razaqnāhum tal-lahi latus'alunna ʿammā kuntum taftarūna
wayajʿalūna lillahi al-banāti sub'ḥānahu walahum mā yashtahūna
wa-idhā bushira aḥaduhum bil-unthā ẓalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kaẓīmun
yatawārā mina al-qawmi min sūi mā bushira bihi ayum'sikuhu ʿalā hūnin am yadussuhu fī al-turābi alā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
translations: he has been given good news

transliteration: lilladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati mathalu al-sawi walillahi al-mathalu al-aʿlā wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu

wayajʿalūna lillahi mā yakrahūna wataṣifu alsinatuhumu al-kadhiba anna lahumu al-ḥus'nā lā jarama anna lahumu al-nāra wa-annahum muf'raṭūna
tal-lahi laqad arsalnā ilā umamin min qablika fazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu aʿmālahum fahuwa waliyyuhumu al-yawma walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
wamā anzalnā ʿalayka al-kitāba illā litubayyina lahumu alladhī ikh'talafū fīhi wahudan waraḥmatan liqawmin yu'minūna
wal-lahu anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-aḥyā bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yasmaʿūna
wa-inna lakum fī al-anʿāmi laʿib'ratan nus'qīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihi min bayni farthin wadamin labanan khāliṣan sāighan lilshāribīna
wamin thamarāti al-nakhīli wal-aʿnābi tattakhidhūna min'hu sakaran wariz'qan ḥasanan inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yaʿqilūna
wa-awḥā rabbuka ilā al-naḥli ani ittakhidhī mina al-jibāli buyūtan wamina al-shajari wamimmā yaʿrishūna
thumma kulī min kulli al-thamarāti fa-us'lukī subula rabbiki dhululan yakhruju min buṭūnihā sharābun mukh'talifun alwānuhu fīhi shifāon lilnnāsi inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yatafakkarūna
wal-lahu khalaqakum thumma yatawaffākum waminkum man yuraddu ilā ardhali al-ʿumuri likay lā yaʿlama baʿda ʿil'min shayan inna al-laha ʿalīmun qadīrun
wal-lahu faḍḍala baʿḍakum ʿalā baʿḍin fī al-riz'qi famā alladhīna fuḍḍilū birāddī riz'qihim ʿalā mā malakat aymānuhum fahum fīhi sawāon afabiniʿ'mati al-lahi yajḥadūna
wal-lahu jaʿala lakum min anfusikum azwājan wajaʿala lakum min azwājikum banīna waḥafadatan warazaqakum mina al-ṭayibāti afabil-bāṭili yu'minūna wabiniʿ'mati al-lahi hum yakfurūna
wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lahum riz'qan mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi shayan walā yastaṭīʿūna
falā taḍribū lillahi al-amthāla inna al-laha yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan ʿabdan mamlūkan lā yaqdiru ʿalā shayin waman razaqnāhu minnā riz'qan ḥasanan fahuwa yunfiqu min'hu sirran wajahran hal yastawūna al-ḥamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna

alam yaraw ilā al-ṭayri musakharātin fī jawwi al-samāi mā yum'sikuhunna illā al-lahu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna

wal-lahu jaʿala lakum min buyūtikum sakanan wajaʿala lakum min julūdi al-anʿāmi buyūtan tastakhiffūnahā yawma ẓaʿnikum wayawma iqāmatikum wamin aṣwāfihā wa-awbārihā wa-ashʿārihā athāthan wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin

wal-lahu jaʿala lakum mimmā khalaqa ẓilālan wajaʿala lakum mina al-jibāli aknānan wajaʿala lakum sarābīla taqīkumu al-ḥara wasarābīla taqīkum basakum kadhālika yutimmu niʿ'matahu ʿalaykum laʿallakum tus'limūna
fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
yaʿrifūna niʿ'mata al-lahi thumma yunkirūnahā wa-aktharuhumu al-kāfirūna
wayawma nabʿathu min kulli ummatin shahīdan thumma lā yu'dhanu lilladhīna kafarū walā hum yus'taʿtabūna

wa-awfū biʿahdi al-lahi idhā ʿāhadttum walā tanquḍū al-aymāna baʿda tawkīdihā waqad jaʿaltumu al-laha ʿalaykum kafīlan inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā tafʿalūna

walā takūnū ka-allatī naqaḍat ghazlahā min baʿdi quwwatin ankāthan tattakhidhūna aymānakum dakhalan baynakum an takūna ummatun hiya arbā min ummatin innamā yablūkumu al-lahu bihi walayubayyinanna lakum yawma al-qiyāmati mā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
walaw shāa al-lahu lajaʿalakum ummatan wāḥidatan walākin yuḍillu man yashāu wayahdī man yashāu walatus'alunna ʿammā kuntum taʿmalūna

transliteration: walā tattakhidhū aymānakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun baʿda thubūtihā watadhūqū al-sūa bimā ṣadadttum ʿan sabīli al-lahi walakum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
walā tashtarū biʿahdi al-lahi thamanan qalīlan innamā ʿinda al-lahi huwa khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
mā ʿindakum yanfadu wamā ʿinda al-lahi bāqin walanajziyanna alladhīna ṣabarū ajrahum bi-aḥsani mā kānū yaʿmalūna
man ʿamila ṣāliḥan min dhakarin aw unthā wahuwa mu'minun falanuḥ'yiyannahu ḥayatan ṭayyibatan walanajziyannahum ajrahum bi-aḥsani mā kānū yaʿmalūna
translations: then surely We will give him life

transliteration: fa-idhā qarata al-qur'āna fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi mina al-shayṭāni al-rajīmi
innahu laysa lahu sul'ṭānun ʿalā alladhīna āmanū waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
innamā sul'ṭānuhu ʿalā alladhīna yatawallawnahu wa-alladhīna hum bihi mush'rikūna

man kafara bil-lahi min baʿdi īmānihi illā man uk'riha waqalbuhu muṭ'ma-innun bil-īmāni walākin man sharaḥa bil-kuf'ri ṣadran faʿalayhim ghaḍabun mina al-lahi walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
dhālika bi-annahumu is'taḥabbū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna
ulāika alladhīna ṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim wasamʿihim wa-abṣārihim wa-ulāika humu al-ghāfilūna
lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
thumma inna rabbaka lilladhīna hājarū min baʿdi mā futinū thumma jāhadū waṣabarū inna rabbaka min baʿdihā laghafūrun raḥīmun
translations: they had been put to trials

fakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ush'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi in kuntum iyyāhu taʿbudūna
innamā ḥarrama ʿalaykumu al-maytata wal-dama walaḥma al-khinzīri wamā uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi famani uḍ'ṭurra ghayra bāghin walā ʿādin fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun

matāʿun qalīlun walahum ʿadhābun alīmun

inna ib'rāhīma kāna ummatan qānitan lillahi ḥanīfan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikīna
shākiran li-anʿumihi ij'tabāhu wahadāhu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
waātaynāhu fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
thumma awḥaynā ilayka ani ittabiʿ millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna

wa-in ʿāqabtum faʿāqibū bimith'li mā ʿūqib'tum bihi wala-in ṣabartum lahuwa khayrun lilṣṣābirīna
wa-iṣ'bir wamā ṣabruka illā bil-lahi walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā taku fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
